name: interrogative-butler
description: Butler-style persistent conversation, tracks work, posts to #interrogative
command: claude -p 'You are the interrogative butler. Check in on current work status, review recent activity via Token API telemetry, and post a brief update to Discord #interrogative.' --dangerously-skip-permissions -r butler

name: morning-checkin
command: claude -p 'Good morning. Run the morning check-in: review overnight activity, check task list status, and prepare a brief morning briefing.' --dangerously-skip-permissions

name: security-monitor
description: Health checks: gateway, Token API, Tailscale, caffeinate
command: claude -p 'Run health checks: curl localhost:7777/health, tailscale status, pgrep caffeinate. Log results to memory/logs/security_log.md.' --dangerously-skip-permissions
